item.title: [UPDATED] Critical RCE Flaw in WSUS Allows Unauthenticated SYSTEM Takeover
item.description:
A critical remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability, CVE-2025-59287, with a CVSS score of 9.8, has been discovered in Microsoft's Windows Server Update Services (WSUS). The flaw allows an unauthenticated attacker on the same network to gain SYSTEM-level privileges on a vulnerable server by sending ...
